Back to Joseph Haydn

Joseph Haydn

Sonata in D major, Hob. XVI:14

before 1767 · Landon 16

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 13'

  • 1. Allegro moderato
  • 2. Menuet – Trio
  • 3. Finale: Presto

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · XVIII, 1 · HN 5472 · Klaviersonaten / 1. Folge · ed. Georg Feder
  • Associated Board · Selected Keyboard Sonatas / Book II · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Henle · HN 1336 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band I · ed. Georg Feder
  • Henle · HN 1337 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band I · ed. Georg Feder
  • Henle · HN 1536 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band I · ed. Georg Feder
  • Könemann · K 121 · Sonaten I · ed. Miklós Dolinszky
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50256 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band I · ed. Christa Landon / Ulrich Leisinger

1. Allegro moderato

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Menuet – Trio

A version of the menuet is also used as the eighteenth of the eighteen menuets (Hob. IX:20).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

3. Finale: Presto

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2
